seller.oneLinerTitle: Message me first before place the order
seller.description:
I am a graphic designer passionate about creating carousel infographics. I have created high-quality content such as infographics and carousels for various Instagram accounts which has generated a high level of satisfaction. 

I will develop your personal as well as business website and also responsible for designing and modifying your website, from layout to function according to your specifications. 
On big projects we work as a team as i have a team of professional developer and designer who work on different technologies.

certifications.certificationName: Branding Strategy and Design for Small Businesses

activeEducations.school: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology, Surat
P.D. Pandya Institute of Computer Application

reviews.comment: Dhrumit's work in creating 10 gorgeous carousel posts for my new Instagram account was nothing short of exceptional. The graphics were of the highest quality, exuding a sense of luxury and professionalism. Dhrumit's attention to detail, creativity, and ability to craft visually captivating posts were truly commendable. These carousel posts have significantly elevated the visual appeal of my Instagram account. If you're looking for top-tier graphics, Dhrumit is the designer to trust. Thank you, Dhrumit, for your outstanding contributions to my social media presence!

Not all revisions always understood and taken on board. Had to repeat myself. Otherwise good design and fast delivery time. Just wish I didn't need to ask for so many revisions as it took 7 days and ideally I wanted to post it 2-3 days ago.

Dhrumit's work in creating 10 Instagram carousel ads was absolutely outstanding. Each ad exuded a polished and high-end feel that perfectly aligned with my brand. Dhrumit's attention to detail, creative prowess, and ability to craft visually captivating ads were truly commendable. These carousel ads have significantly enhanced my marketing efforts and left a lasting impression on my audience. If you're looking for top-quality and polished Instagram carousel ads, Dhrumit is the designer to trust. Thank you, Dhrumit, for your exceptional contributions to my marketing campaigns!
Great experience, fast work, understanding and creative. Everything you want from a designer. Price was a bit high, but it was only one story. I hope I can get a good price for a package.

Solid quality, good communication and quick turnaround. The only constructive feedback I would give is that the messages on revisions weren't being read properly, as revisions were coming back without actioning specific instructions from previous messages. All in all, a good service. Thank you
